name: debezium-connector-mongodb
title: Debezium MongoDB CDC Connector
description: Debeziumâ€™s MongoDB Connector can monitor a MongoDB replica set or a MongoDB sharded cluster for document changes in databases and collections, recording those changes as events in Kafka topics. The connector automatically handles the addition or removal of shards in a sharded cluster, changes in membership of each replica set, elections within each replica set, and awaiting the resolution of communications problems.

support.summary:
Confluent supports Debezium's MongoDB CDC Connector version 0.9.3 and later, and using this connector with MongoDB version 3.4 or later. Find more information here.

This connector is supported by Confluent as part of a Confluent Platform subscription.
